segments.text: We have achieved great success last year.The most important is that we realize our strength lies in after-sale service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your achievement is obvious to all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What we will do is to strengthen it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , this is also the competitive edge of our company .
segments.speaker: S2
